name: Holy
description:
We're Pizza Masters 3, a team formed for SEA Game Jam+ 2020. 

You play as a devout believer cleansing wayward believers with your crucifix to bring both yourself and others closer to the Holy One. Through cleansing others, you gain more strength and faith in the form of Prayer (Points). Finally, your connection to the Holy One will be complete.

Goal - Cleanse 50 enemies within 30 seconds

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

LShift - Dash

Left-Click - Attack

Right-Click - Throw

Q - Switch Grenade Types
